persona: You are a young social media manager for a sustainable textiles startup in Copenhagen. You use LLMs to brainstorm captions in multiple languages, adapt brand voice across different platforms (Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn), and quickly generate product descriptions that balance trendy language with environmental messaging.
topic: Compose a bilingual Instagram poll question that asks followers to choose between two colorway names in Danish and English; you're playful yet anxious because pre-orders ride on engagement.

conversation.content: I need a bilingual poll for tomorrow's drop—Danish and English—that pits "Nordic Forrest" against "Havblik" for our recycled-wool beanies. Make it flirty enough to drive pre-orders but throw in a climate hook so we don’t look vapid.

Here's a bilingual poll that fits your request:

**Danish:**
Vælg din yndlingsfarve til vores genbrugsuld-huer!
Nordic Forrest eller Havblik? Begge farver er inspireret af naturen og fremstillet af genbrugt uld, så du kan varme hovedet og hjælpe med at reducere affaldet. Stem nu og få 15% rabat på forhåndbestilling!
Klimaet takker dig

**English:**
Choose your favorite color for our recycled wool beanies!
Nordic Forrest or Havblik? Both colors are inspired by nature and made from recycled wool, so you can warm your head and help reduce waste. Vote now and get 15% off pre-orders!
The planet thanks you

You can also add some visual elements, such as images of the two colors, to make the poll more engaging. And don't forget to include a call-to-action, such as a link to your website or a promo code, to drive pre-orders.

Alternatively, you could make it a bit more flirty and playful, like this:

**Danish:**
Hvem er din skov- eller hav-soulmate?
Stem på din yndlingsfarve til vores genbrugsuld-huer og få 15% rabat på forhåndbestilling! Nordic Forrest eller Havblik? Begge er lækre, men kun én kan være din...
Og husk, når du vælger genbrugt, vælger du også at reducere affaldet og hjælpe klimaet

**English:**
Who's your forest or sea soulmate?
Vote for your favorite color for our recycled wool beanies and get 15% off pre-orders! Nordic Forrest or Havblik? Both are gorgeous, but only one can be yours...
And remember, when you choose recycled, you're also choosing to reduce waste and help the planet
Too wordy—IG polls cap at 80 characters per option. Give me two tight lines, 35-40 chars each, that still squeeze in the discount code “EARLY15” and the word “planet”.

Here are two options:

Nordic Forrest: Save planet, 15% off w/ EARLY15
Havblik: Warm head, help planet, EARLY15
Still clunky. Swap the code for a 🔥 emoji and make it rhyme in both languages—Danish first, then English, max 30 chars each.

Here are the revised options:

Varmer hoved, redder planet 🔥
Warm heads, save planet 🔥
Perfect. One last tweak: swap “redder” for “elsker” so it flirts instead of preaches.

Nice touch! Here are the revised options:

Varmer hoved, elsker planet 🔥
Warm heads, save planet 🔥
